snippet.title: Fullstack MyJournal - Home Posts CRUD in HTML EJS (Ep 3)
snippet.description:
With our routes in place and persistence ready, we can start creating an HTML interface that helps create and display the post objects in our database.  This step requires a little html coding where we will be utilizing form and POST requests.  Finally we'll also need to implement a delete button for each object.

Previous Lesson: https://youtu.be/vQ7WNrDK-BI

Fullstack Social NodeJS iOS HTML:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Fullstack-Social-iOS-NodeJS-REST

AppStore JSON APIs
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/AppStore-JSON-APIs
